snippet.title: Slide!! Trailer July 2019 - Level Editor and Turbo Mode!
snippet.description:
Slide!! has just been updated on Steam. It now includes a built-in level editor and full Steam Workshop integration. We have also added "Turbo Mode" to get things moving a little quicker!

Link to Slide!! on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/664190/Slide/
